entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Winchester
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:14 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 3:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -10.5°C
Wind: SSW 29 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow early this evening. Local blowing snow this evening and overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
